title: Group DISBANDED in champ select % penalized for it?
body:
So I had just gotten into a game and we were in champ select, when suddenly the game freezes and CRASHES, and completely exists itself out. 
Internet was still working fine.
I restart it and its really slow and nothing is loading, and then I get this pop up saying "a server error occurred and the group was disbanded", and after that everything loaded again. But when I went to start another game, I found that I had leaver buster :\ its only 5 minutes but its annoying that it was a server crash and I got penalized for it. What exactly could have happened AND can we get a way so that people aren't penalized when the game crashes?

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to the game platform dropped entirely, causing the client to crash out. Reasons for this are often related to an *unstable connection* to our servers. I'd like you to ensure all your local network settings are configured for League by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if this helped.
